text: ラッキー! / カジさんにショッピングを付き合ってもらえるなんて! / な、なんだ? / ここ水着コーナーじゃないか! / ねえねえ、これなんかどう?
translation: Lucky! I can't believe I get to go shopping with Kaji-san! / Wh-what? / This is the swimsuit section! / Hey, hey, how about this one?

vocabulary.meaning: to accompany, to go along with

grammar: てもらえる - receiving a favor (potential form); なんて - expresses surprise or disbelief; じゃないか - masculine confirmation particle

text: いや、はや、中学生にはちょっと早すぎるんじゃないかな
translation: Well, uh, isn't that a bit too advanced for a middle school student?
grammar: 〜には - as for/for; すぎる - excessive degree; んじゃないかな - tentative negative suggestion (masculine)

text: カジさん、遅れてる! / 今時こんくらい、あったりまえよ! / ほう、そうなんだ
translation: Kaji-san, you're behind the times! / Nowadays this much is totally normal! / Oh, is that so?

vocabulary.meaning: to be behind, to be late

grammar: 〜てる - contracted form of ている (continuing state); こんくらい - colloquial for このくらい (this much)

text: せっかくの修学旅行だもん / パーッと気分を解放しなきゃ / 修学旅行どこ?
translation: It's a special school trip after all / I've got to totally let loose! / Where's the school trip?
grammar: せっかくの - emphasizes something is special/precious; だもん - casual explanatory tone (feminine); しなきゃ - contracted form of しなければ (must do)

text: 沖縄! / メニューにはね、スクーバーダイビングも入ってんの / スクーバね
translation: Okinawa! / The itinerary even includes scuba diving / Scuba, huh
grammar: には - particle combination for emphasis; 入ってんの - contracted form of 入っているの (is included)

text: そんやもう3年も潜ってないな / ねえ、カジさんは修学旅行どこ行ったの?
translation: Wow, I haven't dived in 3 years / Hey, where did you go for your school trip, Kaji-san?
grammar: も - emphasis particle (as many as); 〜てない - contracted negative of ている (haven't been doing); な - masculine sentence-ending particle

text: ああ、俺たちそんなのなかったんだ / どうして?
translation: Ah, we didn't have anything like that / Why not?
grammar: 俺たち - we (masculine); なかったんだ - explanatory past negative

text: セカンドインパクトがあったからな
translation: Because there was Second Impact
grammar: からな - masculine casual explanatory particle (because, you know)

text: えぇ!?
translation: What!?
grammar: Extended vowel え elongated for emphasis and surprise

text: 修学旅行に行っちゃダメ!? / さ、どうして? / 戦闘待機だもの。 / そんなの聞いてないわよ! / 今言ったわ。 / 誰が決めたのよ!
translation: I can't go on the school trip!? / Why? / You're on combat standby. / I never heard that! / I just told you. / Who decided that!?
grammar: ちゃダメ - contraction of てはダメ (must not); だもの - explanatory particle; 聞いてない - haven't heard; のよ - feminine emphatic particle

text: 作戦担当のあたしが決めたの。
translation: I, the operations officer, decided it.
grammar: の - nominalizer emphasizing the subject; が - subject marker emphasizing who did it

text: あんた、お茶なんかすすってないで、ちょっとなんか言ってやったらどうなの? / 男でしょ!
translation: You, instead of sipping tea, why don't you say something to her? / You're a man, aren't you!
grammar: なんか - dismissive particle (something like); ないで - without doing; 言ってやる - to say (for someone's benefit); でしょ - isn't it?, right?

text: だ、僕はたぶんこういうことになるんじゃないかと思って。 / 諦めてたってわけ?
translation: I-I thought this was probably how it would turn out. / You mean you had given up?

vocabulary.meaning: to give up, to resign oneself

grammar: んじゃないかと思って - thought that it would probably; てた - past progressive; ってわけ? - you mean to say?

text: ふっ情けない / 飼い慣らされた男なんて最低 / そういう言い方はやめてよ
translation: Hmph, pathetic / A tamed man is the worst / Stop talking like that
grammar: 飼い慣らされた - passive past tense (been tamed); なんて - dismissive particle; やめてよ - please stop (request with よ)

text: 気持ちはわかるけど / こればっかりは仕方ないわ
translation: I understand how you feel, but / There's nothing we can do about this
grammar: けど - but (casual); ばっかりは - specifically this (and nothing else); 仕方ない - unavoidable situation

text: あなたたちが修学旅行に行っている間に / 使徒の攻撃があるかもしれないでしょ
translation: While you're on the school trip / There might be an Angel attack, you know
grammar: ている間に - while doing; かもしれない - might, possibly; でしょ - you know, right? (seeking agreement)

text: いつもいつも大器大器大器大器
translation: Always, always waiting, waiting, waiting, waiting
grammar: Repetition of 待機 (たいき) four times for emphasis and frustration

text: いつ来るかわかんない敵を相手に守ることばっかし / たまには敵の居場所を突き止めて攻めに行ったらどうなの
translation: We're always just defending against an enemy that could come at any time / Why don't we track down the enemy's location and go on the offensive for once?

vocabulary.meaning: to attack, to go on offensive

grammar: かわかんない - casual for かわからない (don't know when); ばっかし - emphatic variant of ばっかり (only/just); たまには - once in a while; どうなの - what about it?

text: それができればやってるわよ / ま、二人ともこれをいい機会だと思わなきゃ / クラスのみんなが修学旅行に行ってる間
translation: If we could do that, we would be doing it / Well, you two should think of this as a good opportunity / While everyone in class is on the school trip
grammar: できれば - if possible; やってる - doing (contracted); わよ - emphatic feminine particle; 思わなきゃ - must think (contracted from 思わなければ)

text: 少しは勉強ができるでしょ / 私が知らないとでも思ってるの
translation: You'll be able to study a bit, won't you? / Do you think I don't know?
grammar: 少しは - at least a little; できるでしょ - can do, right?; とでも思ってるの - do you even think that...?

text: 見せなきゃバレないと思ったら大間違いよ / あなたたちが学校のテストで何点取ったかなんて情報ぐらい / 筒抜けなんだから / バカみたい / 学校の成績が何よ
translation: If you thought you wouldn't get caught by not showing it, you're dead wrong / Information like what scores you got on your school tests / Is completely transparent to us / How stupid / Who cares about school grades?

vocabulary.meaning: to be found out, to be exposed

grammar: 見せなきゃバレない - if you don't show, won't get caught; 思ったら - if you thought; なんて - such as, like; ぐらい - about, approximately; なんだから - because (explanatory); みたい - like, seems; 何よ - what (is it)? (dismissive)

text: 急退前とした限定式のテストなんか何の興味もないわ / 強にいれば強に従え
translation: I have no interest in limited-format tests from backward regions / When in Rome, do as the Romans do
grammar: なんか - dismissive particle (things like); 何の...もない - no... whatsoever; 郷に入れば郷に従え - Japanese proverb equivalent to 'When in Rome...'

text: 日本の学校にも慣れてちょうだ / いー / った
translation: Get used to Japanese schools too / Ugh / Ow

vocabulary.meaning: to get used to, to become accustomed

grammar: てちょうだ - please do (feminine command); いー - prolonged sound of annoyance; った - sound of pain

text: アスカお土産買ってくるからね
translation: Asuka, I'll buy you a souvenir, okay?
grammar: てくる - to do and come back; からね - because/so (soft reminder or promise)

text: ああ二人とも残念だったな / お前らの分まで楽しんできたるわ / なははははは
translation: Ah, too bad for you two / I'll enjoy it enough for your share too / Hahahaha
grammar: だったな - was, wasn't it; お前ら - you guys (plural, rough); まで - even, as far as; てきたる - Kansai dialect for てくる (will do and come)

text: 浅間山の観測データは / 下級的速やかにバルタザールからメルキオールへペーストしてください
translation: The observation data from Mt. Asama / Please paste it from Balthasar to Melchior as quickly as possible in descending order
grammar: てください - please do (polite request); バルタザール/メルキオール - names of MAGI supercomputers

text: 中学旅行? / こんなご時世にのんきなものね
translation: Middle school trip? / How carefree in times like these
grammar: こんな - such, like this; ご時世 - the current times (formal); ものね - it is indeed (feminine agreement)

text: こんなご時世だからこそ遊べるときに遊びたいのよ / あの子たち
translation: It's precisely because of times like these that they want to play when they can / Those kids
grammar: だからこそ - precisely because; 遊べるときに - when they can play; 遊びたい - want to play; のよ - explanatory feminine particle

text: 何してんの? / 理科の勉強
translation: What are you doing? / Studying science
grammar: してんの - contracted form of しているの (doing); 理科の勉強 - noun phrase (science study)

text: ったくお利口さんなんだから / そんなこと言ったってやらなきゃいけないんだから / じゃーん
translation: Geez, you're such a good student / Even if you say that, I have to do it / Ta-da!

vocabulary.meaning: geez, good grief (contraction of まったく)

grammar: なんだから - because (you) are; 言ったって - even if you say; やらなきゃいけない - must do; じゃーん - sound effect for revealing something

text: 沖縄でスクーバーできないんだからここで潜るの / そう / どれどれ何やってんの / ちょっと見せて
translation: Since I can't scuba in Okinawa, I'm diving here / I see / Now let's see what you're doing / Show me a bit
grammar: できないんだから - because/since can't do; ここで - here, in this place; どれどれ - now let me see; やってんの - what are you doing (contracted)

text: この程度の数式が解けないの?
translation: You can't solve equations of this level?
grammar: この程度の - of this level; 解けない - cannot solve (potential negative); の - questioning particle (with rising intonation)
